summary: The Dacian kingdom lies at the eastern border of the Roman Empire.Only the river Danube separates the two mortal enemies.The Dacian king Decebalus knows that soon the vastly superior Roman legions will cross the river and attack Dacia.
cast: Pierre Brice|Marie-José Nat|Georges Marchal|Amza Pellea|Mircea Albulescu|Alexandru Herescu|György Kovács|Ion Apahideanu|Leopoldina Balanuta|Ion Banica|Geo Barton|Ion Besoiu|Ion Birá|Florin Blanarescu|Anatol Bogdan|Emil Botta|Dumitru Butnariu|Dumitru Cadar|Gheorghe Calin|Paun Calin|Radu Camburu|Ilarion Ciobanu|Mihai Ciuca|Gheorghe Constantinescu|Mihai Constantinescu|Vasile Constantinescu|Vasile Cosma|Rolanda Costache|Dumitru Craciun|Stelian Cremenciuc|Szabolcs Cseh|Alina Curcui|Cornel Dinescu|Gheorghe Dinica|Nicolae Dolea|Ion Dorutiu|Ion Eftimie|Fory Etterle|Gheorghe Fitz|Gheorghe Fodoreanu|Tanase Gavril|Iosif Gheorghe|Dinu Gherasim|Dumitru Ghiuzelea|Corneliu Gîrbea|Stefan Iordache|Petre Laurentiu|Constantin Lungeanu|Petre Mateiciuc|Constantin Moldoveanu|Tiberiu Munteanu|Iulian Necsulescu|Simion Negrila|Sergiu Nicolaescu|Pampu Nita|Vasile Nitulescu|Alexandru Olah|Ion Olah|Papil Panduru|Ion Pascu|Emanoil Petrut|Alexandru Virgil Platon|Haralambie Polizu|Emanuel Popescu|Viorel Raba|Stefan Radulescu|Nicolea Rascanescu|Carol Roth|Paul Rusca|Remus Saramet|Nicolae Secareanu|Septimiu Sever|Nicu Simion|Mircea Sintimbreanu|Stelian Stancu|Tudor Stavru|Grigore Stefan|Alexandru Vasiliu|Gheorghe Voico|Alexandru Vrancea
title: Dacii
